title: Assistant Engineer Service and Support
tagsAndSkills: Identify the problems of execution of given task and solve them using engineering principles.,Create digital O&M manuals if required.,Communicate and follow up with clients about specific projects and their goals,Servicing,Execution,Client,O,Manual
jobDescription:
Assistant Engineer JD


Job Title: Assistant Engineer Service & Support Team
Company: Alan Scott Automation and Robotics Ltd.
Location: Rabale MIDC, Navi Mumbai


Responsibilities:


The job profile of Assistant Engineer is diversified as it includes a variety of tasks and responsibilities in their respective disciplines. The major job responsibilities of Assistant Engineer are as follows:

  1. Communicate and follow up with clients about specific projects and their goals
  2. Generate invoices for clients based on services rendered and in coordination with the Project Manager & service manager
  3. Prepare written estimates for clients based on labor, materials, equipment and other expenses under guidance of senior.
  4. Coordinate with suppliers and vendors to ensure our team or customer teams have the materials, when they need.
  5. Communicate with site superintendents about delays and any other issues that must be communicated to clients
  6. Create digital O&M manuals if required.
  7. Preparing the Installation, Service & AMC reports as per the instructions of higher authorities.
  8. Assisting Service Manager in conducting, designing systems, and analyzing data of specific projects or task.
  9. Identify the problems of execution of given task and solve them using engineering principles.
  10. Taking daily follow-up with customers & vendors for payments & materials.
  11. Collaborating with co-workers to meet the goals of projects.


Assistant Engineer Requirements


  • Bachelors degree in Mechanical Engineering/Diploma in mechanical engg. In the concerned specialization from any government approved Institution.
  • Required 1 to 2 years experience or freshers also can apply.
  • They should have a good academic knowledge and proven hands-on experience in the relevant field.
  • Also they have good communication skills in writing mails as well telephonic conversation in English & Hindi language.
  • They should be curious to learn and adopt new technologies for advancement in their career.
  • Good in personal discipline.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

title: BigData Splunk Engineer
tagsAndSkills: Python,Cyber Security,Networking,SIEM,Splunk,React.Js,Hacking,Security
jobDescription:
The candidate would be working on Big Data Analytics Tool - Splunk. The position is full-time Remote position with Avotrix, located in Mahape, Navi Mumbai



Preferred candidate profile

The candidate would be working on Big Data Analytics Tools - Splunk, IoT, AWS, ELK, DevOps tools, and Mobile App Development (Either or a combination of these platforms). The position is a full-time position with a startup company Avotrix.

Job Title - BigData Splunk Engineer
Job Type - Full-Time Position
Job Description - The candidate would be working on Big Data Analytics Tools - Splunk, IOT, AWS, ELK, Mobile App Development (Either or a combination of these platforms)


  • Freshers will be trained on Splunk software and equip them with the necessary skills to work in various roles within Splunk that includes hands-on experience with Splunk, understanding its architecture, features, and functionalities, as well as gaining proficiency in using Splunk for different purposes.
  • Post training freshers will be proficient for various role in Splunk ecosystem:
  • User: Understanding how to use Splunk for data searching, visualization, and reporting.
  • Developer: Learning how to develop custom Splunk applications, create custom search queries, and work with Splunk's APIs.
  • Admin: Gaining skills in configuring and managing Splunk deployments, including user access, data inputs, and system optimization.
  • Architect: Developing a deep understanding of Splunk's architecture and best practices for designing and implementing complex Splunk solutions.

We provide an on-job training and salary will be paid too.

Annual package will be 3Lakh, also candidate must adhere 3-year bond with company.

We follow work from home culture. Coming to central office will be on requirement/performance basis.


Required Skill Set:

  • Freshers/Recent graduates can apply.
  • Minimum B.E/ BSc / BCA / MCA
  • Possess good communication skills, both oral and written
  • Should have good command on Technology i.e C, C++, Java, Data structure on Linux platform & Python.
  • Should be good in Aptitude & Analytical skill.
  • Knowledge of operating systems (Windows, Linux).
  • Basic Networking knowledge.
  • Computer basics
  • Basic idea of rest API working.
  • Experience on React/JS would be Big Plus
  • Knowledge on Cyber Security, Ethical Hacking is preferred.
  • Can learn new technology based on the project need on a minimal guidance.
  • Have a good attitude - should be committed to the work.
  • Willing to work in USA shift (6:00 PM - 3:00 AM IST)


Perks and benefits

T & C
3 Years Bond
US Work Timing (6 PM IST to 3 AM IST)
Compensation - 3 LPA CTC

Please apply only if you agree to 3 years bond.
